HyperTransMorph
===============

Overview
--------
HyperTransMorph conditions TransMorph on additional hyperparameters or metadata
via a hypernetwork, enabling adaptive registration behavior.

Key modules
-----------
- ``MIR.models.HyperTransMorph``

Related tutorials
-----------------
- `IXI HyperTransMorph <https://github.com/junyuchen245/MIR/tree/main/tutorials/IXI_HyperTransMorph>`_
